pr_title: wappalyzer: Add technology descriptions to tooltip/API output

timeline.message:
Add technology descriptions to tooltip/API output

- Application > Add description field, getter and setter.
- TechPanel > Add handling for getting the tooltip based on the
description.
- WappalyzerAPI > Include the description in detailed API output.
- WappalyzerJsonParser > Set the description when available.
- CHANGELOG > Add a change note.

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: If empty string is returned then a weird blank box is shown (in dark mode anyway).
timeline.author: kingthorin
